lead_paragraph: China wants to get 300 million citizens involved in winter sports by the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics and plans to encourage them by building more than 500 ice skating rinks and 240 ski slopes over the next six years, the government said.

headline.print_headline: China Plans Skiing, Skating Drive for 2022 Winter Games
headline.main: China Plans Skiing, Skating Drive for 2022 Winter Games

snippet: China wants to get 300 million citizens involved in winter sports by the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics and plans to encourage them by building more than 500 ice skating rinks and 240 ski slopes over the next six years, the government said....
